attributes.action: Make every MP subject to recall if the electors realise they are very little good
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: most MPs are self serving and greedy and we would be better off without them if they were subject to recall I feel that they would make more of an effort most folk are disgusted with MPs and this move would show that the government was serious about wanting to do something about it

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
